price: 12. Ni-Rabbow digaalá nek kal, diggah nanu aaminenno digaalá nek kaltek iyyan.
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
